summary: The document is a declassified record related to the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It provides detailed information about Eric Starvo Galt, a suspected assassin known by aliases Harvey Lowmyer and John Willard, including his physical descriptions, employment history, and warnings about his dangerous nature. The document also outlines procedures for the distribution of his photo and the reporting of any information regarding his whereabouts.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It details information about Eric Starvo Galt, a suspected assassin with multiple aliases.
Physical descriptions and behavioral traits of Galt are provided, noting he is considered armed and extremely dangerous.
The document instructs on the handling and reporting of any information regarding Galt's whereabouts.
